segments.text: The time has come to say goodbye .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So soon . It seems as if you just got here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I feel that way , too . But all good things must come to an end , as they say .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It certainly has been a pleasure seeing you again and renewing old memories .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've had a great time and thank you for your spending so much time showing me around .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It was fun for me , too . It gave me a chance to get away from my routine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You'll be out to see me next year , as you promised ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yes . I should be there some time next spring .
segments.speaker: S2
